query:
SELECT 
  id,
  youtube_url,
  status,
  CASE 
    WHEN podcast_audio_url IS NOT NULL AND podcast_audio_url != '' THEN '✅ 有 Podcast 音檔'
    WHEN audio_url IS NOT NULL AND audio_url != '' THEN '✅ 有原始音檔'
    ELSE '❌ 無音檔'
  END as audio_status,
  created_at
FROM tasks
WHERE status = 'completed'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;

    WHEN audio_url IS NOT NULL AND audio_url != '' THEN '✅ 有原始音檔'
    ELSE '❌ 無音檔'
  END as audio_status,
  created_at
FROM tasks
